title: Kometa metadata schema (inferred)
description:
A conservative JSON Schema inferred from libraries/series/metadata/appletv+/slowhorses(2022).yml.
This schema is permissive (allows additional properties) but documents the common structure where `metadata` maps show IDs to per-show objects, with `url_poster`, `url_background`, and a `seasons` map (season -> episodes).

metadata.description: Top-level metadata mapping keyed by show/movie/collection ID (keys often numeric tvdb ids).

seasons.description: Mapping of season number -> season metadata (season keys may be numeric).

episodes.description: Mapping of episode number -> episode metadata (episode keys may be numeric).

notes: YAML mapping keys may be parsed as integers by some YAML loaders (PyYAML). When validating against this JSON Schema we recommend converting mapping keys to strings (or performing a key-stringification step) because JSON Schema works with string property names. The schema is intentionally permissive: it documents the observed shape and marks other properties allowed so existing metadata fields are preserved.
